event_name: Physical Design VLSI Course, August 2025 Bangalore..
event_summary:
Here is a concise 2-3 line summary of the event:

Join the Physical Design VLSI Course in Bangalore, starting September 1st, and gain industry-relevant skills from experienced trainers. This comprehensive program offers hands-on training, cutting-edge tools, and a proven track record of placements in top semiconductor MNCs. Ideal for students aspiring to excel in the VLSI industry.
event_description:
​At Bangalore, we are proud to be a team of industry leaders with decades of experience in semiconductor MNCs, now focused on designing and delivering cutting-edge training programs to bridge the gaps in the VLSI industry.

​Our VLSI Design curriculum integrates real-life applications with fundamental techniques and hands-on practical training. This unique approach has made our courses highly appealing to students aspiring to excel in the semiconductor industry. Over the last five years, we have built a strong reputation for our:

​Outstanding placements in leading semiconductor MNCs.

​Highly skilled trainers with in-depth industry expertise.

​Advanced and practical curriculum, tailored to the latest industry demands.

​🌟 We are proud to start our next cohort, on September 1st. Join early to book your seat—your ticket to work with semiconductor giants globally! 🌟

We leads in the following areas:

​​Permanent real-time industrial faculty.

​​Best-in-class tools: ICC2 & Fusion Compiler for lower nodes at 10nm and 7nm. (Access available for 1000+ hours or 12 months).

​​Unbeatable placements in Semiconductor industries.

event_name: An Evening for HR Leaders: Play, Connect, Unwind
event_summary:
Here is a concise 2-3 line summary of the event:

Join an exclusive evening for HR leaders in Kadubeesanhalli/Bellandur, where you'll unwind and connect with peers over Pickleball, relaxed conversations, and refreshments. Leave your inbox behind and enjoy three hours of laughter, new friendships, and maybe even a new hobby. This unique event is designed specifically for HR leaders to prioritize their own well-being and networking.
full_address: 11point club, 77/6, Kaverappa Layout, Kadubeesanahalli, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560103, India
event_description:
​HR is always looking out for everyone else — this time, it’s all about you.

​We’re bringing together a small, select group of HR leaders from companies around Kadubeesanhalli/Bellandur for an evening that’s equal parts play and genuine connection.

​What’s in store:

​2 hours of Pickleball – Easiest sport to learn and play. No prior experience needed (and don't worry, our coaches will guide you)

​1 hour of conversations – Not stiff networking, but relaxed chats with peers who get what it means to build teams and cultures.

​Tea & coffee – Because good conversations are even better with a warm cup in hand.

​It’s three hours away from the inbox, to breathe, laugh, and connect. Come as you are and leave with new stories, new friends, and maybe even a new hobby.

event_name: Product-led Growth for SaaS Startups
event_summary:
Here is a concise summary of the event:

Join this insightful session to learn how product-led growth (PLG) can supercharge your SaaS startup's go-to-market strategy, featuring expert insights, proven frameworks, and real-world case studies. Network with fellow product professionals, founders, and growth enthusiasts after the session. Ideal for product managers and SaaS founders looking to drive growth through product experience.
event_description:
​🚀 Calling All Product Folks & SaaS Founders!

​Are you building or scaling a SaaS product? Curious about how product-led growth (PLG) can supercharge your go-to-market strategy?

​Join us for an insightful session on Product-Led Growth for SaaS Startups — designed specifically for product managers and SaaS founders looking to drive growth through their product experience.

​🔍 What We’ll Cover:

​Introduction to PLG: What it is, why it matters, and how it differs from traditional growth models

​PLG Frameworks: Proven models and strategies to implement PLG in your SaaS business

​Case Studies: Real-world examples of SaaS companies that have successfully adopted PLG

​🤝 Stay for the Networking!
After the session, stick around for 30 minutes of casual networking — connect with fellow product professionals, founders, and growth enthusiasts.

​👥 Who Should Attend?

​Product Managers looking to build growth into the product roadmap

​SaaS Founders aiming to scale efficiently through product-first strategies

event_name: The Sandbox #2
full_address: Frenzy Works, 1st Floor, Piro Cafe 684, 684, Parangi Palaya, Sector 2, HSR Layout, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560102, India
event_description:
​Last time at the Sandbox 1, we all sat down and shared our ideas to get a feel for what everyone’s building. this time, the Sandbox 2 is about locking in and actually making things happen. We’re keeping it super chill, just a bunch of us working on our projects, helping each other out, and seeing where the day takes us. no big rules, no businessy stuff. we’ll be at Ritvi’s place, the Frenzy Works studio, which has the perfect vibe for a build day (adding pics of her space below so you can see what i mean). And if you couldn’t make it to the Sandbox #1, that’s totally fine, you can still jump right in.

PS: Also, will be hosting a virtual meet in the coming week to discuss your requirements and agenda so that we can focus on any needs you want wo work on when we meet up. Further details will be sent through mail


​

event_name: Deloitte Tohmatsu Morning Pitch India - Lifescience & Biotech
full_address: Bengaluru, Karnataka
event_description:
​We are excited to invite you to this edition of Morning Pitch Asia @India on 25th Sep - Lifescience & Biotech in collaboration with Bangalore Bioinnovation Centre (Government of Karnataka).

​​This edition has 4 promising companies from the Lifescience & Biotech sector in India from Porfolio of Bangalore Bioinnovation Centre.

​​Schedule:
10:30 ~ 11:00 (IST) - Venue opens.
11:00 ~ 12:00 (IST) - Morning Pitch starts (Zoom webinar is open for online audience)
11:00 ~ 11:05 (IST) - Morning Pitch India Introduction
11:05 ~ 12:00 (IST) - Pitches by the start-ups
12:00 ~ 13:00 (IST) - Networking session with Lunch (Great opportunity for a face-to-face discussion with founders)

​​Please feel free to extend this invitation to your colleagues in India for in-person participation.
Looking forward to seeing you and your colleagues at the event.

​​About Morning Pitch:
Morning Pitch is the pitching platform hosted by Deloitte Japan where we aim to create collaborations between large corporations/investors and startups.
The event series was originally launched in Japan in 2013, where it has been organized over 500 times, over 2,500 startups have pitched, and more than 88 IPOs and over 550+ business alliances have been created.

event_name: 🚀 AI x Tech Entrepreneurship: Building the Future of Innovation
full_address: Nexus Mall Koramangala, Hosur Rd, Chikku Lakshmaiah Layout, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560095, India
event_description:
​Artificial Intelligence isn’t just a buzzword it’s transforming how businesses are built, scaled, and sustained.
This event is designed for entrepreneurs, tech enthusiasts, and future founders who want to explore AI not just as a tool, but as a partner in shaping tomorrow’s ventures.

​In this session, we’ll discuss and share ideas around:

​How AI is reshaping entrepreneurship and industries

​Practical AI tools & frameworks founders are using today

​Startup case studies and what we can learn from them

​The future of innovation: human creativity + machine intelligence

​This is a conversation and networking meetup focused on cofounder finding, idea sharing, and meaningful connections in AI and entrepreneurship.
It is not a typical event or lecture, but an open space to exchange perspectives, learn from each other, and explore opportunities.

​Participation is limited to 10 genuine individuals, ensuring quality discussions and valuable interactions.

event_name: AI x GPU - Bangalore
full_address: Isobel Coffee House, No. 1/3, Sumeru Enclave, 275, 9th A Main, 2nd Block, Jayanagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560011, India
event_description:
​AI X GPU [Bangalore Chapter]
​​AI Builders x Smart Capital

​​Code. Earn. Converse — Think GPUverse.

Hosted by: GPU.net team in collaboration with top AI & Web3 builders in Bangalore
​📍 Location: ​Isobel Bangalore, 1/3, Ground Floor, Sumer Enclave, Jayanagar 2nd Block, 5th Main Road, Jayanagar, Bangalore.
🗓️ Date & Time: 15.08.2025 | 5:00 PM – 8:00 PM
🎟️ RSVP Required — Limited Seats Available (10–30 pax)

About the Event

​AI × GPU Bangalore is a curated, high-impact meetup that brings together AI/ML engineers, GPU-intensive developers, and pioneering Web3 developers to explore decentralized computing like never before. This isn’t just another developer gathering—it’s where technology meets intention.

​Build. Train. Deploy. On GPU.net in One Day.

​Attendees will:

​👉 Learn how to deploy AI models (like LLaMA, Stable Diffusion, Whisper) using decentralized GPU infrastructure.

​👉 Be among the first to access free GPU compute credits (granted live during the session).

​👉 Join hands-on workshops and insightful discussions with AI and infrastructure leaders shaping our digital future.

​Why You Should Attend

​This event is perfect for:

​AI/ML Engineers looking to push limits with GPU-powered compute

​Developers building decentralized AI tools or applications

​Web3 builders curious about GPU infrastructure at scale

​Expect a heady mix of hands-on building and deep conversation—all fueled by world-class compute and a tightly knit crowd.

Powered by GPU.net

​This event is an exclusive gateway into the GPUverse—where infrastructure becomes community, and compute becomes collaboration.

​Attendees are not just building apps; they’re building the future.

​Register Now

​Secure your spot today

event_name: The AI Hiring Show
full_address: Bengaluru, Karnataka, India
event_description:
​Everything you need to know about The AI Hiring Show: Bangalore Edition
​The AI Hiring Show by Rabbitt Learning is back – and this time, it’s bigger, bolder, and designed for both techies and business brains.

​This isn’t just a hiring event – it’s a career launchpad where you’ll learn from industry leaders, solve real-world problems, and pitch your ideas directly to recruiters.

​Event Flow & Key Dates

​20th August | Pre-Event Webinar (Online)

​Walkthrough of the entire process & format

​Q&A session to clear all doubts

​Joining link will be shared in the WhatsApp group (post registration, link via email)

​22nd August | Tech Summit + Registration + Problem Statements (Offline)

​Venue: IIT Alumni Centre, Bengaluru
Google Maps Link

​Free access to a Tech Summit with 250+ leaders: CHROs, CTOs, CIOs, AI leaders, startup founders, GCC heads, VCs & more

​Mandatory registration for The AI Hiring Show

​Problem statements / case studies will be released (Tech + Business tracks)

​23rd August | Build Day (Online)

​Teams work on their solutions remotely

​Duration: 1 full day

​Use any AI tools and resources to prepare your final solution

​24th August | The AI Hiring Show Finale (Offline)

​Venue: Bangalore (venue announcing soon)

​Submit your solutions + final presentations

​Pitch live to recruiters, founders & AI experts

​Hiring conversations + networking sessions

​Note: Attendance on 22nd August is mandatory to qualify for 24th.

​Event Format

​Round 1 (22nd – 23rd Aug): Problem Solving Sprint

​Tech Track → Solve AI-driven challenges

​Business Track → Crack real case studies on product, growth, marketing, etc.

​Teams (max 4) formed onsite, then work 1 day online

​Round 2 (24th Aug): Pitch + Hiring Conversations

​Submit your solutions & pitch live in 5 minutes

​Impress recruiters, founders & domain experts

​Shortlisted teams/individuals enter on-spot hiring conversations

​Team Formation

​You can form your own team (up to 4 members) – or participate solo.

​If you don’t already have a team, no worries – teams will be assigned during on-site registration on 22nd August.

​If you’re forming your own team, make sure all teammates register individually for the event.

​Attendance of all team members is mandatory on the event days.

​Who Should Attend?

​AI Developers, Engineers, Coders

​Product, Strategy & Business Students

​Marketers, Creators & Operators

​College Students (any stream)

​Working Professionals (0–4 years experience)

​Tech or Non-Tech – all are welcome

​Outcomes

​On-the-spot job offers & interviews

​Free passes to a major Tech Summit (22nd Aug)

​Networking with recruiters, mentors & startup founders

​Certificates of participation

​Rabbitt Learning credits for top teams and all participants.

​Registration Fee:

​₹0 – Absolutely Free

​This edition gives you more time, more exposure, and more opportunities.
Learn from leaders on 22nd, build smart on 23rd, and pitch to win on 24th.

​Register now – seats are limited!
